sentences.en: "The Bodyguard" is a fairly bog-standard thriller.
sentences.cn: 《保镖》是一部毫无新意的惊险电影。

sentences.en: “We also built bog bridges, ” Macie says. “You need to take the supportive logs underneath and remove their bark, because the bark can rot quickly.
sentences.cn: “我们还在沼泽建起小桥，”马西埃说，“你需要将一些原木支在下面，去掉上面的树皮，因为它们腐烂的很快。

sentences.en: Bogwood: Wood that has been preserved in a peat bog.
sentences.cn: 泥炭木: 沼木久埋于泥炭沼泽之中的树木.

sentences.en: Don't walk across that field, it's a bog.
sentences.cn: 不要穿过那片野地, 那是个烂泥潭.

sentences.en: Even the most bog - standard part - time job can increase your marketability.
sentences.cn: [译文]即使低档次的临时工作也能增强你的“可销售性”.

sentences.en: How did the construction work bog down?
sentences.cn: 建筑工程怎样会停下来的?

sentences.en: I told him to bog off.
sentences.cn: 我让他离开。

sentences.en: If he saw a trucker in difficulty, he would just bog in and give a hand.
sentences.cn: 如果他看到一个货运汽车司机有困难的话，他会非常热情地给予帮助。

sentences.en: Keep to the path parts of the moor are bog.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条小路走--荒野上多处是沼泽地.

sentences.en: Last night I put my books in my bog.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我把书放进书包里了.

sentences.en: My name is mildew. My name is bog, fen, marsh and swamp.
sentences.cn: 老子还叫霉菌. 老子还叫泥巴塘子, 泥巴沼子, 黑沼泽,沼泽.

sentences.en: Surely to God, nobody was going to war over a bog.
sentences.cn: 坚信谁也不愿意就一块不毛之地打一场战争.

sentences.en: The occurrence of apomictic reproductive structures on the leaf of the bog orchid, is of interest.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是在叶状沼兰叶子上发生无融合生殖的结构.

sentences.en: They had a cinnamon-like herb called bog myrtle, but it was the Romans who introduced many of the herbs and vegetables that we now know and love.
sentences.cn: 他们有类似桂皮的香料名为沼泽香桃木，但是与很多我们现在了解并且十分喜欢的香料和蔬菜一样，这是古罗马人带来的。

sentences.en: This snowstorm will bog all the cars down in the field.
sentences.cn: 这场暴风雪将使所有的车辆都陷在田野里.

sentences.en: This storm will bog all the cars down in the mud .
sentences.cn: 这场暴雨将使所有的车辆都陷在泥浆里。

sentences.en: Those bog buildings are the mountain retreats of wealthy New Yorkers.
sentences.cn: 那些原木建筑是富有的纽约人的山间隐居所.

sentences.en: We intended from the very beginning to bog the prosecution down over who did this.
sentences.cn: 我们从一开始就打算延缓对责任人提出诉讼。

sentences.en: You think to be detailed, seeing my data, pleasing see the web page of BOG.
sentences.cn: 你们想详细, 看到我的资料, 请看bog网页.

sentences.en: Your car will bog down in the mud.
sentences.cn: 你的车会陷进泥沼的。

trans.tran_cn: 沼泽，泥塘，沼泽地区，<英口>户外厕所
trans.tran_en: an area of low wet muddy ground, sometimes containing bushes or grasses

trans.tran_cn: 使陷于泥沼；使动弹不得
